Articles.Content:
I am going to update my campaign game to take advantage of some of the great visual enhancement mods out there.  I'm not sure which ones to use though.  Does anyone have recommendations or a link to a thread with really good recommendations?

I was about to download Scatterer but I wasn't sure if we needed it anymore in 1.9.  Do we?

List so far:

  • Astronomer's Visual Pack
  • Distant Object Enhancement
  • Engine Lighting
  • EVE
  • PlanetShine
  • Real Plume
  • Reflection Plugin
  • Scatterer (maybe?)
  • ???

Spectra. Contains scatterer, eve and distant object enhancements configs, more lightweight than avp, and great terrain textures(kopernicus is needed for them). KS3P post-processing. HotRockets maybe. And some skybox mod, not sure which will you like.
